Container.Name: bitnami-openldap
Container.Overview: Docker image to run Bitnami OpenLDAP. Check project site for configuration info

Config.Name: LDAP_USERS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of LDAP users to create in the default LDAP tree. Default: user01,user02

Config.Name: LDAP_PASSWORDS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of passwords to use for LDAP users. Default: password1,password2

Config.Name: LDAP_ENABLE_TLS
Config.Description: Whether to enable TLS for traffic or not. Defaults to no

Config.Name: Certs folder path
Config.Description: Path to your certificates e.g. if you're using SWAG it would be /mnt/user/appdata/swag/keys

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_CERT_FILE
Config.Description: File containing the certificate file for the TSL traffic. No defaults. (container's relative path, e.g. /opt/bitnami/openldap/certs/openldap.crt)

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_KEY_FILE
Config.Description: File containing the key for certificate. No defaults. (container's relative path, e.g. /opt/bitnami/openldap/certs/openldap.key)

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_CA_FILE
Config.Description: File containing the CA of the certificate. No defaults. (container's relative path, e.g. /opt/bitnami/openldap/certs/openldapCA.crt)

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_DH_PARAMS_FILE
Config.Description: File containing the DH parameters. No defaults.

Config.Name: LDAP_ROOT
Config.Description: LDAP database root node of the LDAP tree. Default: dc=example,dc=org

Config.Name: LDAP_USER_DC
Config.Description: DC for the users' organizational unit. Default: users

Config.Name: LDAP_GROUP
Config.Description: Group used to group created users. Default: readers

Config.Name: LDAP_CONFIG_ADMIN_ENABLED
Config.Description: Whether to create a configuration admin user. Default: no.

Config.Name: LDAP_CONFIG_ADMIN_USERNAME
Config.Description: LDAP configuration admin user. This is separate from LDAP_ADMIN_USERNAME. Default: admin.

Config.Name: LDAP_CONFIG_ADMIN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: LDAP configuration admin password. Default: configpassword.

Config.Name: LDAP_EXTRA_SCHEMAS
Config.Description: Extra schemas to add, among OpenLDAP's distributed schemas. Default: cosine, inetorgperson, nis

Config.Name: LDAP_SKIP_DEFAULT_TREE
Config.Description: Whether to skip creating the default LDAP tree based on LDAP_USERS, LDAP_PASSWORDS, LDAP_USER_DC and LDAP_GROUP. Default: no

Config.Name: LDAP_CUSTOM_LDIF_DIR
Config.Description: Location of a directory that contains LDIF files that should be used to bootstrap the database. Only files ending in .ldif will be used. Default LDAP tree based on the LDAP_USERS, LDAP_PASSWORDS, LDAP_USER_DC and LDAP_GROUP will be skipped when LDAP_CUSTOM_LDIF_DIR is used. When using this will override the usage of LDAP_ROOT,LDAP_USERS, LDAP_PASSWORDS, LDAP_USER_DC and LDAP_GROUP.

Config.Name: LDAP_CUSTOM_SCHEMA_FILE
Config.Description: Location of a custom internal schema file that could not be added as custom ldif file (i.e. containing some structuralObjectClass). Default is /mnt/user/appdata/bitnami-openldap/custom.ldif

Config.Name: LDAP_ULIMIT_NOFILES
Config.Description: Maximum number of open file descriptors. Default: 1024.

Config.Name: LDAP_ALLOW_ANON_BINDING
Config.Description: Allow anonymous bindings to the LDAP server. Default: yes

Config.Name: Log debug
Config.Description: Turn on debug info in logs
